alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 12:48PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains, and Northern Lea and Central Lea Counties. In Texas, Eastern Culberson County. * WHEN...From 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County
